Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

FLEXcon is committed to providing you the highest level of service. That said, I’d like to take this opportunity to introduce you to a FLEXcon representative as another resource to reach out to when you have questions, ideas, or need assistance finding a solution to an opportunity.

{{Recipient.Owner.Name}}
{{Recipient.Owner.Email}}
{{Recipient.Owner.Phone}}

For applications requiring bio-signal sensing, hydrogel-free electrode technology, namely FLEXcon® OMNI-WAVE™ , please reach out to our expert Amit Roy.

Amit Roy
aroy@flexcon.com
